p: Much of the current and future outcomes about COVID 19 will depend on the actions undertaken from now on. Even a simple diagnostic test, such as a nasopharyngeal swab, has a great impact on the management of the pandemic and control of the spread of disease. In our experience, because of their being familiar with the upper respiratory airways, the Otolaryngologists should play an active role in training and on-field supervision, especially in the case of troublesome nasopharyngeal samplings.
